summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3142 for the improvement of Alley in Block 22, Boren's Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue, from Madison Street to Marion Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38387, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
